Hello fellow traveler, Welcome to the paradise.
Its sad that this is one of the more tame things I've seen
deep shit bro, she is getting fucked by pigs

Oh hey, No one else is here!
... why am I here? Have I finally drifted too far away from God to feel the warmth of his light?
It's dark here....I think any sane person would feel sad or scared, but I feel nothing if not listless content. I wonder if I'll find a way out, I wonder if I have the strength to live any longer. All I know is that I choose not to be sad to numb the pain of existential dread. Maybe someday I'll find someone, find people that I can bond with and feel genuine happiness in making others happy, or maybe I'll die alone; either way, I'm content with either outcome.
